name: Savas Kaya
content: | Kaya Lab 0 1 2 An interdisciplinary nano-engineering lab that focuses on the development and integration of nanoelectronic materials and devices for applications in sensors, computing and communications domains. Recent Work Here are some of our recent works and active projects More About Our Company We will provide basic information on our research and educational activities at this website, and inform you about the latest news from the group members achievements. If our group has openings for any ongoing projects and/or job postings, this page will provide relevant information and links Please visit our pages for regular updates or use RSS links to stay tuned.
